<ref>[http://www.guardian.co.uk/music/2004/apr/30/popandrock.shopping1 The Guardian review]</ref> }} '''''I Don't Want You Back''''' is the debut album by [[United States|American]] [[contemporary R&B|R&B]] singer [[Eamon (singer)|Eamon]], released in the United States on February 17, 2004. The album features his hit single, "[[Fuck It (I Don't Want You Back)]]". ==Track listing== #"Intro" - 0:15 #"[[I Love Them Ho's (Ho-Wop)]]" - 2:27 #"Somethin' Strange" [featuring [[Audio Two|Rap Legend Milk Dee]]] - 3:04 #"On & On" - 3:27 #"[[Fuck It (I Don't Want You Back)]]" - 3:45 #"Get off My Dick!" [featuring Rap Legend Milk Dee] - 3:42 #"Girl Act Right" - 3:05 (produced by [[Roy "Royalty" Hamilton]]) #"My Baby's Lost" - 2:59 #"I Want You So Bad" - 3:30 #"4 the Rest of Your Life" - 4:06 #"All Over Love" - 3:16 #"Controversy" - 3:54 #"Lo Rida" [featuring [[N.O.R.E.]]] - 4:00 #"I'd Rather Fuck with You" - 3:25 (produced by [[Roy "Royalty" Hamilton]]) #"Finally" - 4:00 #"Ass Is Fat" [featuring FCM] â€“ 3:35 [import bonus track] ==Chart positions== {| class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2004) !align="left"|Peak<br/>position |- |align="left"|U.S. [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] |align="center"|7 |- |align="left"|U.S. ''Billboard'' [[Top R&B/Hip-Hop Albums]] |align="center"|3 |- |align="left"|[[UK Albums Chart]] |align="center"|6 |- |align="left"|[[Australian Albums Chart]] |align="center"|34 |- |} ==References== {{reflist}} {{Eamon}} [[Category:2004 debut albums]] [[Category:Eamon albums]] [[Category:Jive Records albums]] {{2000s-R&B-album-stub}}
